title: Deep Gnome (Svirfneblin)
entryLore: Deep gnomes, or svirfneblin, are natives of the Underdark. Suffused with subterranean magic, they possess natural camouflage and a remarkable resistance to magical influence, allowing them to thrive in the perilous depths. They are more somber than their surface-dwelling cousins, their lives shaped by the dangers of the deep earth.

traits.name: Gnomish Camouflage
traits.description: You have [[advantage|Advantage]] on Dexterity ([[stealth|Stealth]]) checks. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your [[proficiency_bonus|Proficiency Bonus]], regaining all uses on a [[long_rest|Long Rest]].

traits.name: Gift of the Svirfneblin
traits.description: You can cast [[disguise_self|Disguise Self]] (level 3) and [[nondetection|Nondetection]] (level 5) once each per Long Rest without components.
